name: suksma - root nz with mycelial symbioses

shapecode_3_g=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=//decay = 0.94
per_frame_1=//per frame less reactive volume for all unused q vars, put before other q vars are set for cop out mashing
per_frame_2=vb = vb*0.95 + (1-vb)*pow(bass_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_3=vvb = vvb*0.95 + (1-vvb)*vb*0.01;
per_frame_4=vm = vm*0.95 + (1-vm)*pow(mid_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_5=vvm = vvm*0.95 + (1-vvm)*vm*0.01;
per_frame_6=vt = vt*0.95 + (1-vt)*pow(treb_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_7=vvt = vvt*0.95 + (1-vvt)*vt*0.01;
per_frame_8=vvb = min(1,max(0,vvb));
per_frame_9=vvm = min(1,max(0,vvm));
per_frame_10=vvt = min(1,max(0,vvt));
per_frame_11=q1 = vvb*2;//0.5 + vb - vvb;
per_frame_12=q2 = vvm*2;//0.5 + vm - vvm;
per_frame_13=q3 = vvt*2;//0.5 + vt - vvt;
per_frame_14=q4=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_15=q5=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_16=q6=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_17=q7=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_18=q8=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_19=q9=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_20=q10=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_21=q11=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_22=q12=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_23=q13=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_24=q14=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_25=q15=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_26=q16=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_27=q17=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_28=q18=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_29=q19=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_30=q20=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_31=q21=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_32=q22=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_33=q23=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_34=q24=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_35=q25=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_36=q26=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_37=q27=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_38=q28=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_39=q29=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_40=q30=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_41=q31=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_42=q32=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=dy = dy -0.005;
per_frame_45=bass_effect = max(max(bass,bass_effect)-1.4,0);
per_frame_46=warp = if(above(bass_effect,0),10,0);
per_frame_47=red_rand = int(rand(100));
per_frame_48=blue_rand = int(rand(100));
per_frame_49=wave_r = 0.01*red_rand + 0.2*sin(time*1.311);
per_frame_50=wave_b = 0.01*blue_rand - 0.2*sin(time*1.46);
per_frame_51=wave_g = 1-0.5*(wave_r+wave_b)+ 0.2*cos(time*0.789);
per_frame_52=zoom=1+(-bass+treb+mid)*.01;
per_pixel_1=dx=(-bass*(ang-y)+treb*(rad+x)+tan(-mid+(y-x)))*.001;
warp_1=`float3 color, mus;
warp_2=`float dx,dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5);
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float rota = lum(tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/4))*q31;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`uv6 = mul(uv1,float2x2(cos(rota),-sin(rota),sin(rota),cos(rota)));
warp_13=`uv6 += sin(q32*uv1);
warp_14=`mus = .2/(sqrt(uv6.x)+.2);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`mus *= float3 (1.1,1,.95);
warp_17=`mus *= .9+.1*tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float2 hor = float2 (0.005,0);
warp_22=`float2 ver = float2 (0,.005);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float dx = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+hor) 
warp_25=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-hor));
warp_26=`float dy = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+ver) 
warp_27=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-ver));
warp_28=`
warp_29=`
warp_30=`float2 zz = float2 (dx,dy);
warp_31=`
warp_32=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv+zz*.02);
warp_33=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_34=`                      ((uv.xyy
warp_35=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_36=`                      ).xyz*
warp_37=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_38=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
warp_39=`                     );
warp_40=`if(crisp.x+crisp.y+crisp.z>.5)crisp += (noise2)*.07; 
warp_41=`float3 crisp2 = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_42=`crisp += crisp2/2;
warp_43=`crisp *= .67;
warp_44=`crisp +=.08 * mus - length(zz)*blur;
warp_45=`
warp_46=`float3 ret1 = crisp - lum(blur)*.04;
warp_47=`ret = ret1 * .99 -  .04 ;
warp_48=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy
comp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_8=`                      ).xyz*
comp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
comp_11=`                     );
comp_12=`if(ret.x+ret.y+ret.z<1.7)ret *= (noise2)*2.5; 
comp_13=`    float bl = GetBlur2(uv);
comp_14=`    float2 texc = bl*ret.xyz;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, texc);
comp_17=`}
